SELECT cc.id, cc.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, c.id_card AS idNumber, u.nickname AS managerName, d.name AS orgName FROM grid_community_customer cc LEFT JOIN grid_customer c ON cc.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN system_users u ON c.manager_id = u.id AND u.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN system_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id AND d.deleted = 0 WHERE cc.deleted = 0
AND c.customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerName}, '%')
ORDER BY cc.create_time DESC
